title: Blended Methodology-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Transitioning to Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in offline education management and foundational digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Based on post-COVID-19 online education transition experiences, there is a need to enhance practical instructional design competencies in educational settings.

learning_goals: Capable of explaining methods to analyze learner needs through survey design
Developing an integrated online-offline lesson design document using mixed methodologies
Proposing strategies to establish a collaborative system among instructors during educational transitions
